reviewText: My young son loves the Bill Nye shows.  This was a great Christmas present for him.  He's watched it over and over.
It was okay. Just wasn't interesting to the child it was bought for. A little to talkitive for him to enjoy
my 10 year old is crazy about Bill Nye. I wish there were more inexpensive videos of his programs.  Can't get enough.  For ADHD kids this is wonderful, good info in quick and entertaining bites!
This is one of my 5-year old son's all time favorite videos. He watches it over and over again, and unlike most kids shows I don't grow tired of watching it with him.
